scripts.build: npm run lint && vue-cli-service build --report --target lib --name @sparkz-community/auth-management-client-lib ./src/index.js
scripts.release:pre: npm run build && npm version prerelease && npm publish --tag pre --access public && git push origin
scripts.release:patch: npm run build && npm version patch && npm publish --access public && git push origin
scripts.release:minor: npm run build && npm version minor && npm publish --access public && git push origin
scripts.release:major: npm run build && npm version major && npm publish --access public && git push origin
